verses.verse: וַתִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> lifted up כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> And all the congregation וַֽיִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> and cried אֶת־ <WH853> קוֹלָ֑ם <WH6963> their voice וַיִּבְכּ֥וּ <WH1058> wept הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> that night הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּלֹּ֙נוּ֙ <WH3885> murmured עַל־ <WH5921> against מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> against אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> and against Aaron כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָעֵדָ֗ה <WH5712> and the whole congregation לוּ־ <WH3863> unto them Would God מַ֙תְנוּ֙ <WH4191> that we had died בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt א֛וֹ <WH176> Or בַּמִּדְבָּ֥ר <WH4057> in this wilderness הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this לוּ־ <WH3863> or would God מָֽתְנוּ׃ <WH4191> we had died

וְלָמָ֣ה <WH4100> Why יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> And wherefore hath the LORD מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> brought אֹתָ֜נוּ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> unto הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> us unto this land הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לִנְפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> to fall בַּחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> by the sword נָשֵׁ֥ינוּ <WH802> that our wives וְטַפֵּ֖נוּ <WH2945> and our children יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> will become לָבַ֑ז <WH957> plunder הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> not ט֦וֹב <WH2896> not be better לָ֖נוּ שׁ֥וּב <WH7725> for us to return מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> Egypt

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִ֑יו <WH251> to another נִתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> Let us make רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> a captain וְנָשׁ֥וּבָה <WH7725> and let us return מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> into Egypt

וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> fell מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> Then Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and Aaron עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> on their faces לִפְנֵ֕י <WH6440> before כָּל־ <WH3605> of all קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> all the assembly עֲדַ֖ת <WH5712> of the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֗וּן <WH5126> of Nun וְכָלֵב֙ <WH3612> and Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <WH3312> of Jephunneh מִן־ <WH4480> who הַתָּרִ֖ים <WH8446> [which were] of them that searched אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land קָרְע֖וּ <WH7167> rent בִּגְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH899> their clothes

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> And they spake אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> unto all the company בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> The land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָבַ֤רְנוּ <WH5674> which we passed בָהּ֙ לָת֣וּר <WH8446> through to search אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> טוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> good הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> land מְאֹ֥ד <WH3966> is an exceedingly מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> is an exceedingly

אִם־ <WH518> If חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> delight בָּ֙נוּ֙ יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> If the LORD וְהֵבִ֤יא <WH935> in us then he will bring אֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> unto הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> us into this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וּנְתָנָ֖הּ <WH5414> and give לָ֑נוּ אֶ֕רֶץ <WH776> it us a land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִ֛וא <WH1931> he זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> which floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Only בַּֽיהוָה֮ <WH3068> not ye against the LORD אַל־ <WH408> not תִּמְרֹדוּ֒ <WH4775> Only rebel וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> and do אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <WH3372> neither fear אֶת־ <WH853> עַ֣ם <WH5971> ye the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לַחְמֵ֖נוּ <WH3899> for they [are] bread הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like סָ֣ר <WH5493> is departed צִלָּ֧ם <WH6738> for us their defence מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and וַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> from them and the LORD אִתָּ֖נוּ <WH854> do אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָאֻֽם׃ <WH3372> [is] with us fear

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> bade כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> But all the congregation לִרְגּ֥וֹם <WH7275> stone אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בָּאֲבָנִ֑ים <WH68> them with stones וּכְב֣וֹד <WH3519> And the glory יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD נִרְאָה֙ <WH7200> appeared בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation אֶֽל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> before all the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֥נָה <WH579> befall יְנַאֲצֻ֖נִי <WH5006> provoke הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> How long will this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> will this וְעַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֙נָה֙ <WH579> befall לֹא־ <WH3808> me? and how long will it be ere יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> they believe בִ֔י בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הָֽאֹת֔וֹת <WH226> me for all the signs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> which I have shewed בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> among

אַכֶּ֥נּוּ <WH5221> I will smite בַדֶּ֖בֶר <WH1698> them with the pestilence וְאוֹרִשֶׁ֑נּוּ <WH3423> and disinherit וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> them and will make אֹֽתְךָ֔ <WH853> לְגוֹי־ <WH1471> nation גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> of thee a greater וְעָצ֖וּם <WH6099> and mightier מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> than

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְשָׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> shall hear מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֶעֱלִ֧יתָ <WH5927> [it] (for thou broughtest up בְכֹחֲךָ֛ <WH3581> in thy might אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this מִקִּרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> from among

וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they will tell אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹשֵׁב֮ <WH3427> [it] to the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> of this land הַזֹּאת֒ <WH2063> They שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> [for] they have heard כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you O יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that thou LORD בְּקֶ֖רֶב <WH7130> [art] among הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עַ֨יִן <WH5869> face בְּעַ֜יִן <WH5869> to face נִרְאָ֣ה ׀ <WH7200> art seen אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that thou LORD וַעֲנָֽנְךָ֙ <WH6051> and [that] thy cloud עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> standeth עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH5921> over וּבְעַמֻּ֣ד <WH5982> in a pillar עָנָ֗ן <WH6051> of a cloud אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> and You הֹלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> over them and [that] thou goest לִפְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH6440> before יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> them by day time וּבְעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> and in a pillar אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> by night

וְהֵמַתָּ֛ה <WH4191> Now [if] thou shalt kill אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> [all] this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> as one וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> of thee will speak הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> then the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> which have heard אֶֽת־ <WH853> שִׁמְעֲךָ֖ <WH8088> the fame לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

מִבִּלְתִּ֞י <WH1115> was not יְכֹ֣לֶת <WH3201> able יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Because the LORD לְהָבִיא֙ <WH935> to bring אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> which he sware לָהֶ֑ם וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֖ם <WH7819> unto them therefore he hath slain בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> them in the wilderness

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now יִגְדַּל־ <WH1431> be great נָ֖א <WH4994> pray כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> And now I beseech thee let the power אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> of my Lord כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> according דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> as thou hast spoken לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶ֤רֶךְ <WH750> is slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <WH639> to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> and of great חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> mercy נֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> forgiving עָוֹ֖ן <WH5771> iniquity וָפָ֑שַׁע <WH6588> and transgression וְנַקֵּה֙ <WH5352> and by no means לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְנַקֶּ֔ה <WH5352> clearing פֹּקֵ֞ד <WH6485> [the guilty] visiting עֲוֹ֤ן <WH5771> the iniquity אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> of the fathers עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> upon the children עַל־ <WH5921> unto שִׁלֵּשִׁ֖ים <WH8029> unto the third וְעַל־ <WH5921> and רִבֵּעִֽים׃ <WH7256> and fourth

סְלַֽח־ <WH5545> Pardon נָ֗א <WH4994> pray לַעֲוֹ֛ן <WH5771> I beseech thee the iniquity הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this כְּגֹ֣דֶל <WH1433> according unto the greatness חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> of thy mercy וְכַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you נָשָׂ֙אתָה֙ <WH5375> and as thou hast forgiven לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> from Egypt וְעַד־ <WH5704> until הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> even until now
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD סָלַ֖חְתִּי <WH5545> I have pardoned כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1697> according to thy word

וְאוּלָ֖ם <WH199> But [as] truly חַי־ <WH2416> [as] I live אָ֑נִי <WH589> I וְיִמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> shall be filled כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> with the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> all the earth

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Surely כָל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> Because all those men הָרֹאִ֤ים <WH7200> which have seen אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבֹדִי֙ <WH3519> my glory וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣תֹתַ֔י <WH226> and my miracles אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> which I did בְמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וּבַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> and in the wilderness וַיְנַסּ֣וּ <WH5254> have put אֹתִ֗י <WH853> זֶ֚ה <WH2088> these עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> me now these ten פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and have not hearkened בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> to my voice

אִם־ <WH518> Surely they shall not יִרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לַאֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> unto their fathers וְכָל־ <WH3605> shall any מְנַאֲצַ֖י <WH5006> neither shall any of them that provoked לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִרְאֽוּהָ׃ <WH7200> me see

וְעַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> But my servant כָלֵ֗ב <WH3612> Caleb עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> because הָֽיְתָ֞ה <WH1961> had ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> spirit אַחֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH312> he had another עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> has וַיְמַלֵּ֖א <WH4390> me fully אַחֲרָ֑י <WH310> with him and hath followed וַהֲבִֽיאֹתִ֗יו <WH935> him will I bring אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּ֣א <WH935> whereinto he went שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> in it וְזַרְע֖וֹ <WH2233> and his seed יוֹרִשֶֽׁנָּה׃ <WH3423> shall possess

וְהָֽעֲמָלֵקִ֥י <WH6003> (Now the Amalekites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> and the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> dwelt בָּעֵ֑מֶק <WH6010> the valleys מָחָ֗ר <WH4279> tomorrow פְּנ֨וּ <WH6437> turn וּסְע֥וּ <WH5265> you and get לָכֶ֛ם הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> you into the wilderness דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way יַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> of the Red פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֗י <WH4970> How לָעֵדָ֤ה <WH5712> congregation הָֽרָעָה֙ <WH7451> How long [shall I bear with] this evil הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> like מַלִּינִ֖ים <WH3885> which murmur עָלָ֑י <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> תְּלֻנּ֞וֹת <WH8519> the murmurings בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הֵ֧מָּה <WH1992> they מַלִּינִ֛ים <WH3885> which they murmur עָלַ֖י <WH5921> against שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH8085> against me? I have heard

אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> about חַי־ <WH2416> I live אָ֙נִי֙ <WH589> I נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> truly לֹ֕א <WH3808> unto them [As truly as] כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you דִּבַּרְתֶּ֖ם <WH1696> as ye have spoken בְּאָזְנָ֑י <WH241> in mine ears כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> so will I do לָכֶֽם׃
